title: Dinartether
author: Dinartether
created_time: November 26, 2023, 04:27:57 AMLast edit: November 26, 2023, 05:16:54 AM by Dinartether
content: https://dinartether.com/web-screenshot.pngPROJECT IDEA: Introducing Dinartether, the groundbreaking achievement, of decentralized Finance and Assets. The new star on the horizon is an era of real-world assets on the blockchain. DINT is designed as a blockchain-compliant digital means of payment for goods and services. Dinartether falls under the widely recognized category of payment and exchange. In recent months, a surge in credit card theft has plagued online shoppers, making transactions on insecure websites a nerve-wracking experience. That's precisely why we've embarked on this project ‚Äì to empower internet users with a secure and private shopping experience. With Dinartether, you can confidently make online purchases without fear, as your transactions are shielded from prying eyes, ensuring your privacy and security in every online endeavor.FAIR LAUNCH:We are committed to a fair launch, with no pre-mining.SPECIFICATION:name: DinarTetherticker: DINTmaturity: 100max supply: 105,120,000 p2p port: 12022RPC port: 12021halving: 1,051,200block time: 1 mindiff time: 2,016 blocksblock reward: 50premined: 0algo: KAWPOWblocks: 36,689,600days: 24,090years: 66MORE INFORMATION:Website ¬†https://dinartether.comGithub https://github.com/Dinartether/DinartetherTwitter https://twitter.com/dinartetherDiscord https://discord.com/invite/2Cyvt6hAExplorer https://explorer.dinartether.comPool https://pool.dinartether.comTelgram https://t.me/dinar_tether

comments.author: MMOStars
comments.body: Typical scam. ANN made on 26, mean time silently pre-mined for 2 whole days while trying to decisive miners and investors saying there is no pre-mine. Ofc there is, you can see it from your own explorer. Also the whitepaper magically has token allocations for this and that. How can that even be a thing when you claim something to not have a pre-mine and fair launch? No answer to this question on the board or discord. Can mods start removing such threads as when owners clearly have fraudulent and decisive initiative? https://explorer.dinartether.com/e94dca40ea69dce184e3f5762d05baee4e09decfbf1971003693e44129439195¬†¬†¬†1¬†¬†¬†50.00¬†¬†¬†Nov 24, 2023 00:08:31 GMT+2]https://explorer.dinartether.com/tx/e94dca40ea69dce184e3f5762d05baee4e09decfbf1971003693e44129439195

comments.author: Dinartether
comments.body: Dear esteemed members of the Dinartether (DINT) community,We are pleased to announce a significant milestone for all enthusiasts and supporters of DINT. With great joy, we wish to extend our heartfelt congratulations to each one of you. It is with immense pride that we share the news of DINT's impending listing on its inaugural exchange (Finexbox) scheduled to occur on the 29th of November 2023.This upcoming listing marks a momentous occasion in the journey of DINT, symbolizing an important step towards increased accessibility and exposure for our beloved cryptocurrency. We recognize and deeply appreciate the dedication and unwavering support demonstrated by our community members, whose enthusiasm and commitment have played an integral role in this achievement.The team at Dinartether is profoundly grateful for your continued trust and belief in the potential of DINT. We are excited about the prospects this listing brings and are committed to fostering further growth and development within our vibrant community.Once again, we extend our warmest congratulations to all DINT enthusiasts on this remarkable milestone. Let us celebrate this achievement together and anticipate the promising future ahead for DINT.Warm regards,DinarTether
